content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information about tinnitus, including
sympathetic reading of tinnitus claims
requesting medical opinions for tinnitus
interpreting medical opinions involving tinnitus
, and
applying liberalizing provisions for tinnitus
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B - Conditions of the Auditory System
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B
